data.text: @THR @WendellPierce I can't believe the female neighbor called police on him. How is it you don't know you live next door to a movie star? He needs to sue this messy neighbor.
@THR The cops received a call a large black man broke into his house. It’s frustrating but the cops have to investigate.
@THR This brod's phone number should have been identified by police.....she should have been charged with something. This is ridiculous. Ving is absolutely right......this could have been a fatality.
@THR It should start being a crime to purposely try to get a person shot by the police by making a false 911 call. They should give the name and show a picture of the caller all calls are recorded
@THR @WendellPierce LAPD are pricks. You should have gone medieval on their ass, Ving.

@THR @WendellPierce Sometimes I think I know what racism entails then I read a story like this one. We white people will never know, even if we try. It’s like insanity - if you don’t experience it, you can’t understand.

@THR Whatever Heidi what headlines give the reason WHY...The Maddness is he was at HIS house  minding his frigging business!! Was it a neighbor or a neighbor's guest that called the popo?  Reality, this is happening like it's the norm SMDH
@THR 5th grade.. first time 5 0 pulled a g on me (us). i was on someone's roof hiding.. we were playing manhunt .. #unfortunatechildhoodgames loll

@THR Check the 911 tape for the callers description. The gun was going to be pointed at whoever opened the door....I appreciate Ving’s fear for his kid. He’s right. How are the police wrong in what they did? Tough call
@THR Hey leave Mission Impossible Ving backoff American police his house his yard yer
@THR Pathetic - outrageous on so many levels!
